did.abstract: Letter from Walter Hubbell to his wife describing his trip to Detroit through Lake Ontario and Lake Erie.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Walter Hubbell letter, 1838, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_sectionA.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, November 2021.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Walter Hubbell was a resident of Canandaigua, New York.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Letter from Walter Hubbell to his wife describing his trip to Detroit through Lake Ontario and Lake Erie.

controlaccess.geogname: Ontario, Lake (N.Y. and Ont.) -- Description and travel
